metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11107 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
phpLDAPadmin through 1.2.3 has XSS in htdocs/entry_chooser.php via the form, element, rdn, or container parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpldapadmin - 1.2.2-5.2ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpldapadmin package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-5.2ubuntu2.1').
